task_description: Tap the 'Get started' button within the Audio Recorder app.
Explore the main screen of the Audio Recorder app after launching it.
Check for any settings or preferences options within the Audio Recorder app.
Familiarize yourself with the user interface of the Audio Recorder app.
Look for any help or tutorial sections within the Audio Recorder app.
Identify the record button within the Audio Recorder app.
Check for any information about the app version within the Audio Recorder app.
Navigate back to the welcome screen of the Audio Recorder app, if possible.
Observe the visual elements and design of the Audio Recorder app.
Identify the audio waveform display within the Audio Recorder app.
